attributes.action: Stop charging NHS workers car parking charges.Without staff NHS cannot function
attributes.background:
I recently spent some time in our local Bassett Law Worksop hospital and found out that the nursing and auxillary staff have to pay around £8-50 a day parking charges,tax on their salarys takes it to around £10 a day.Schemes now being proposed to charge night workers aswell.
Stop charging them NOW
